Title: 40943 - # Tips for Lighting Your Garden This Spring
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 tips for lighting up a garden this spring. You can talk about things like strung lights, path lights, etc. Be sure to give tips for style and design as well. You can find a bunch of great advice in the resource links. Your target URL is gardeners, and this article will be placed on a gardening site. You can link to your target URL by mentioning strung lights as way to light your garden.

Title: 40944 - # Tips for Setting the Mood With Lighting In Your Home
Direction: 500 words. Give 3-6 tips for setting the mood with indoor lighting. Typical overhead lighting can be dull and boring. So talk about unique lighting ideas, such as using Christmas lights indoors, hanging paper lanterns, replacing classic light bulbs with colored bulbs and other creative ideas. Your target audience is interested in home décor and this piece will be placed on a site that talks about stylish interiors. You can link to your target URL when you discuss using strung Christmas lights indoors.
